about_the_game:
Rise to power in a suit driven world or work with the downtrodden striving for more? You must decide who you prioritize and at what cost. With conspiracies around every corner, will you work with the suits and dominate this city, help the rebels fighting for equality or choose another path entirely?

In-Depth Character Customization:

Character customization allows players to build their character stats to fit their exact needs. Players can create an obscenely overpowered build, something horribly gimped or anything in-between.

Multi-Path Level Design:

Levels are designed for multiple playstyles in mind. Players can sneak through hostile territory while mastering the element of stealth or go guns blazing tearing down enemies left and right. Whether it's sneaking, hacking, going guns blazing or a more peaceful route, players can find a variety of environmental options available to them.

Player Driven Choice:

Throughout the story, players are given a wide variety of choices. Some known, some hidden, but all can add up to something greater. Who you side with, who you betray and who you lie to all matters. There are multiple endings available, all of which are directly tied to player behavior throughout the gameplay experience.

Arsenal of Weapons:

Players have access to a wide assortment of weapons to choose from. No one is saying the GREP gun is in anyway, shape or form similar to the GEP gun. That would be ridiculous. However, can they both open doors as well as they can people? Perhaps...

content_descriptors.notes:
Game contains content not appropriate for all ages.
This includes strong language, violence, drugs, alcohol and sexual references.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 1200 or Intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 560X 4GB or Nvidia Equivalent
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Subject to change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A semi-open world RPG set in a cyberpunk universe. Inspired by games like Deus Ex, CHROME SWEAT grants players a wide degree of class customization options and in-game choices. Your decisions will impact the fate of this city and its denizens.
